name: WordsCrossing
description:
Solve more than 100 levels of crossword puzzles!
The new mechanics of the game will not let you get bored!

Playing in WordsCrossing is simple and at the same time fascinating - colorful picture-tips will give you the opportunity to practice fantasy and imagination, together with logic and memory!

What is WordsCrossing:

- A new interesting crossword mechanics
- the ability to increase vocabulary
- colorful pictures
Train your brain on the way to the office or from work to home, playing in WordsCrossing!

Test our new game, and share your impressions in the comments!
